title: Apple ranks behind Disney and Tesla in new brand intimacy survey
content:
In MBLM’s Brand Intimacy 2022 Study, Apple has ranked third in how consumers bond with the brands they use and love, staying behind Tesla (second place) and Disney (first place). Here are the top findings of the report.

more…

The post Apple ranks behind Disney and Tesla in new brand intimacy survey appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: In MBLM's Brand Intimacy 2022 Study, Apple has ranked third in how consumers bond with the brands they use and love.
